bug.short_desc: None of the demos are working in Firefox 4 beta

long_desc.thetext: A few days ago I gave the Firefox 4 beta a spin and recognized, that none of the qooxdoo demos are working in it. They just show a white page and there's nothing in the JavaScript console. I tried all three versions available (1.1.1, 1.2 and 1.3-pre). The latest version of Firefox I tried on Windows 7 x64 was "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:2.0b6pre) Gecko/20100911 Firefox/4.0b6pre". I could only test the x64 version since the latest x86 version hangs when trying to open any website, but they were both broken a few days ago.

qooxdoo is relying on XUL labels in gecko which support has been removed with 4.0 (see bug #4058). Maybe thats the reason for that. I will take a look at it as soon as possible. Thanks for the report!
My users are already hitting this bug. Quite many people seem to use bleading edge Firefox. Please consider making a maintenance release after fixing the bug.
I will check that issue pretty soon (maybe tomorrow) and if we can fit it properly, we will give you the change to update (via patch release of patch).
@Martin: It would be great to have this also fixed in legacy 0.7
@Dietrich I will talk to Andreas about that.
